title: TCT Clip: The Intellectual Dark Web, Tom Holland, and Woke culture
description:
Pastor Paul VanderKlay and I discuss the deficiencies and merits of the Intellectual Dark Web, I read an amusingly familiar description of the 17th century Separatists, and we consider historian Tom Holland's refreshing and admirably nuanced perspective on woke culture...



Paul's channel:
https://www.youtube.com/user/paulvanderklay

Tom Holland's Dominion:
https://bookshop.org/books/dominion-how-the-christian-revolution-remade-the-world/9780465093502

Saints and Strangers by George F Willison:
https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/367104.Saints_and_Strangers
